name: Kinesthesis
description:
Don't crack! Avoid pointy objects and hitting the ground too hard; For a guy made of ice, these are your worst enemies! Controls
  • WASD to move
  • Mouse (hover and click) to use kinesthesis
Grab the key and get to the door to finish the level! Developers
  • SpaceScape - Art and animations + Some programming
  • Rocco - Lead Programmer
  • JollyGoodFriend - Music
  • ShatteredReality - Programmer (fixed bugs)
